title: Turkey patties with tomatoes and mushrooms
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped', '2 large cloves garlic, crushed', 'A large pinch of ground cumin', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) minced turkey', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To serve', '4 large field mushrooms', '2 large tomatoes, halved', '8 slices French bread', '4 large fresh basil leaves', 'Relish or mustard, optional']
